expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Altmeier et al. (2010)	bedrock	Altm2010-54	Altm2010-Z	68	-71.5128	12.5747	1540	4	2.65	1	23180000	1040000	S555	0	0	0	2008	1150000	40000	-	-	1420146	143221	92777	-	-	-	-

Reference:
Altmeier M, Herpers U, Delisle G, Merchel S, Ott U, 2010. Glaciation history of Queen Maud Land (Antarctica) reconstructed from in-situ produced cosmogenic 10Be, 26Al and 21Ne. Polar Science 4, 42-61.

Data comments:
Sample thickness assumed to be 4 cm ("The samples were taken from the uppermost surface of the rocks, corresponding to a shielding depth of less than 5 cm").
Topographic shieldin factor assumed to be 1.
Sampling year assumed to be 2008.

expage.github.io
